about_the_game:
●AIR HOCKEY × INTENSE BATTLE SYSTEM!

Merge an easy-to-understand air hockey rules with an intense battle system!

Hit the ball! Achieving simple yet profound gameplay and competitiveness!

One match in 90 seconds! Play swiftly in a short time! One more round, one more time! The irresistible fun that you can't quit!

●THE MATCH IS INTENSE!

Match with friends from around the world online! Of course, you can also match offline!

An overwhelming game balance where no charging or inflation occurs!

●TEAM COMPOSITION IS INTENSE!

Assemble a team with 3 characters!

Main usage? Support usage? The breadth of strategy expands with planning!

Heavy on power? Emphasizing skills? The joy of customization is limitless!

●SUPER UNIQUE CHARACTERS!

The world of Break Beats! features a lineup of famous and popular characters!

From bird people and transforming detectives to robots, individuals with extraordinary abilities, and even superheroes!

You're sure to find your favorite too!

●BOX GACHA!

All characters are drawn with the same probability, and there are no duplicates!

Draw for the number of participants, and you'll complete it! Enjoy matches with your favorite characters!

New characters will be added one after another!

●YOU CAN PLAY AS MUCH AS YOU LIKE!

It's not a game where you can play as much as you want whenever you want!

There is no stamina system or advertisements!

BB! as much as you want anytime, anywhere! Enjoy to your heart's content!

●DIVERSE GAME MODES!

Team-building battle deck mode with limited starting hand!

Park mode where you can enjoy a different style of play!

Data recorded, including usage count and travel distance!

A collection where you can gather various elements!

A record that shows the best score for each mode!

An immense volume that you can't play through completely!

【HOW TO PLAY】

●RULE

BB! is a sport where teams compete in 3-on-3 matches.

The objective is to score by putting the ball into the opponent's goal within 90 seconds or by defeating all of the opponent's characters to achieve victory.

●CHARACTER

Both offense and defense are executed by controlling characters.

Characters have five stats.

・WEIGHT ... Heavy

・LIFE ... Resilience to hits

・POWER ... Speed of the hit ball

・SPEED ... Movement speed

・SKILL ... Strength of skills

●SKILL

Skills have various effects for each character, making it the most distinctive stat that showcases individuality.

By double-tapping a character with a full gauge, you can consume the gauge to use that character's skill.

Effects that take immediate action, those with a charge time before activation, ones requiring additional input, and others with a long-lasting duration. Activation forms and effects vary widely.

●MAXIMUM DRIVE

You can perform a Maximum Drive by triple-tapping the character.

When performing a Maximum Drive, the character enters an KAKUSEI state with full life recovery, a 1-second reduction in stun downtime, and a significant boost in stats.

You can only execute the Maximum Drive once during a match.

※We offer paid items for those who are busy and may prefer a quicker option.
